Interface Summary

Class Summary
AlphaModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
BaseDoubleValueSpanModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
BaseSingleValueSpanModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
BaseTripleValueSpanModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
ColorModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
ContainerExpireModifier An ExpireModifier that holds other BaseSingleValueSpanModifiers, overriding their toTimes to match the lifeTime of the particle based on the value from the ExpireModifier.
ExpireModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
OffCameraExpireModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
OnAndOffCameraExpireModifier Causes the particle to expire after it has entered and left the view of the camera.
RotationModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
ScaleModifier (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
